articles.title: One of the biggest icebergs, weighing trillion tonne, breaks off Antarctica: Scientists - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Scientists said the iceberg, measuring 5,800 square km, calved away from the Larsen C Ice Shelf in Antarctica sometime between July 10 and 12.
articles.content:
